document.docAuthor: Menzel, Frank, Smith, Jane E. & Chandler, Peter J.
document.docOrigin: Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society 146 (1)
document.masterDocTitle: The sciarid fauna of the British Isles (Diptera: Sciaridae), including descriptions of six new species

Ecological notes : very common in broad-leaved, mixed and carr woodland; also found in ancient pine woodland and conifer plantations; heathland; wetlands including fens, basin mires, bogs, water meadows and wooded lake margins; calcareous grassland; gardens; island with seabird colonies; open montane habitats. v–xi.
